title: Becoming a 'Live Player'
description:
Becoming a Live Player is Rebel Wisdom's latest online course. This will be a journey we are all going on together starting in May 2021. 

"We need to play a new game, and to play it we need new players. In a world increasingly run by people and institutions following rigid scripts and uninspired stories, we need to learn how to become a “live player”.

In this course you will playfully develop capacities to help navigate our uncertain times, communicate across political divides, and authentically co-create a new world with a sense of aliveness."

It will be a set of skills and practices, led by Rebel Wisdom's David Fuller, and Peter Limberg of The Stoa.

To find out more and to apply, check here: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/courses/liveplayers

A small number of bursaries are available to help those who cannot afford the full ticket price. Welcome to email courses@rebelwisdom.co.uk to apply.
